name: Button
description: A button component for user actions.

name: Tabs
description: A set of tabs for navigating between different views.

name: Listbox
description: A component that allows users to select one or more items from a list.

name: Dropdown
description: A dropdown menu for displaying a list of options.

name: Link
description: A component for navigating to a different page or section.

name: Form
description: A container for form elements that handles submission and validation.

name: Input
description: A basic text input field for forms.

name: Label
description: A component to provide accessible labels for form fields.

name: CircularProgress
description: A component to indicate progress in a circular format. It has multiple 'slots' for styling.

name: Card
description: A container for content with a distinct background and shadow.

name: CardBody
description: The main content area within a Card component.

name: Accordion
description: A component to display a list of high-level options that can expand/collapse.

name: Autocomplete
description: A text input that filters a list of options.

name: AutocompleteItem
description: An individual item within an Autocomplete list.
code_snippet: // See Autocomplete

name: AutocompleteSection
description: A component to group items within an Autocomplete list.

name: Alert
description: A component to display temporary notifications and feedback.

name: Avatar
description: A component to represent a user, displaying a profile picture, initials, or a fallback icon.

name: AvatarGroup
description: A component to display a group of avatars.

name: Badge
description: A component to display a small numerical value or status descriptor for UI elements.

name: Breadcrumbs
description: A component to display a hierarchy of links to the current page.

name: BreadcrumbItem
description: An individual item within a Breadcrumbs component.
code_snippet: // See Breadcrumbs

name: ButtonGroup
description: A component to group multiple buttons together.

name: Calendar
description: A component to display one or more date grids and allow users to select a date.

name: CardHeader
description: The header section of a Card, typically used for a title.

name: CardFooter
description: The footer section of a Card, typically used for actions.

name: Checkbox
description: A component that allows users to select one or more items from a list.

name: CheckboxGroup
description: A component to group multiple checkboxes, allowing users to select one or more items.

name: Chip
description: A small block of essential information that represents an input, attribute, or action.

name: Code
description: A component to display inline code.

name: DateInput
description: A component that allows users to enter and edit date and time values via keyboard.

name: DatePicker
description: A component that combines a DateInput and a Calendar popover.

name: DateRangePicker
description: A component that allows users to enter or select a date and time range.

name: Divider
description: A component to separate content.

name: DropdownItem
description: An individual item within a DropdownMenu.
code_snippet: // See Dropdown

name: DropdownSection
description: A component to group items within a DropdownMenu.
code_snippet: // See Dropdown

name: Drawer
description: A panel that slides in from the edge of the screen.

name: Image
description: A component to display images with support for fallback and effects.

name: InputOtp
description: A component to enter one-time passwords (OTP).

name: Kbd
description: A component to display a keyboard key or combination of keys.

name: ListboxItem
description: An individual item within a Listbox.
code_snippet: // See Listbox

name: ListboxSection
description: A component to group items within a Listbox.
code_snippet: // See Listbox

name: Modal
description: A dialog that requires user attention or provides additional information.

name: Navbar
description: A responsive navigation header.

name: NumberInput
description: A component for users to enter a number, with stepper buttons.

name: Pagination
description: A component to display active page and navigate between multiple pages.

name: Popover
description: A non-modal dialog that floats around its disclosure trigger.

name: Progress
description: A component to display the progress of an activity.

name: RadioGroup
description: A component to allow users to select a single option from a list.

name: RangeCalendar
description: A component that allows users to select a date range.

name: ScrollShadow
description: A component that applies shadows when content overflows on scroll.

name: Select
description: A component that displays a collapsible list of options and allows a user to select one or more.

name: Skeleton
description: A placeholder to show a loading state and the expected shape of a component.

name: Slider
description: A component that allows a user to select one or more values within a range.

name: Snippet
description: A component to display inline or multiline code snippets with a copy button.

name: Spacer
description: A component to add space between components.

name: Spinner
description: A component to express an unspecified wait time.

name: Switch
description: A component used as an alternative between checked and not checked states.

name: Table
description: A component to display tabular data using rows and columns.

name: Textarea
description: A multi-line input component for large texts.

name: TimeInput
description: A component for entering and editing time values via keyboard.

name: Tooltip
description: A small pop-up that displays information on hover or focus.

name: User
description: A component to display user information with an avatar, name, and description.
